briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of Oral Febuxostat in Subjects With Gout

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Subjects Whose Last Three Serum Urate Levels Are <6.0 Milligram Per Deciliter (mg/dL)
Percentage of Subjects Whose Serum Urate Levels Are <6.0 mg/dL at Final Visit
Absolute Change in the Serum Urate Level at the Final Visit Relative to Baseline
